a.n: Halifax To Saint Pierre And Miquelon Route

p.k: One of the most exciting summer ocean races, the 350-mile long race between Canada and France is back. Starting in Halifax Waterfront, Nuova Scotia and ending in France's Saint Pierre et Miquelon, the race is an all-around thrill to watch. Back again for its 9th edition, tune in as we bring you the best moments and highlights directly from the racing grounds.
